stadium.name: The Prismatic Pavilion
stadium.description: A massive, permanent, open-air fairground pavilion built on stilts over the Starlight Lagoon. The field is a chaotic mix of colorful stage-planks, constantly surrounded by the Prismatic Troupe's performers.

stats.pregame_ritual: Sticking a specific type of feather in their helmet's plume.
Jogging three laps around the perimeter of the field.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.
Tracing an invisible, complex sigil over their heart.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.
Leading the team in a synchronized chant that slowly gets louder.
Staring at their reflection in a bucket of water until they feel 'ready'.
Telling a terrible joke to the Trollball to 'loosen it up'.
Staring intently at their gauntlets, as if for the first time.
Plucking a single hair from a teammate's beard for luck.
Trying to start a 'slow clap' with the audience before the game has begun.

Plucking a single hair from a teammate's beard for luck.

stadium.name: The Glowstone Terrace
stadium.description: A massive, opulent stadium built on one of the city's main terraces, carved directly into the mountainside. The field is famously paved with polished Glowstone, and the stands overlook the bustling Confluence Market and the ongoing construction of the Guild's Skyport.

stats.pregame_ritual: Doing a terrible, clumsy dance to 'loosen the joints'.
Chugging a raw egg, shell and all.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Arm-wrestling the player who plays the same position on their team.
Speaking only in rhymes for the hour before the game.
Rubbing the Trollball on their armpits for 'grip'.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Going over the game plan drawn in the dirt with the team captain.
Covering their forearms in a sticky tree sap for 'grip'.
Eating a dandelion, stem and all.
Headbutting their own team's goal post (gently).
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Speaking only in rhymes for the hour before the game.
Rubbing the Trollball on their armpits for 'grip'.
Headbutting their own team's goal post (gently).
Chugging a raw egg, shell and all.
Going over the game plan drawn in the dirt with the team captain.

preGame:
### üéôÔ∏è STEP RIGHT UP, SPORTS FANS! THE PLAYOFFS ARE HERE! üéôÔ∏è

Hello, you ghouls, ghosts, and glorious gladiators of the gridiron! It‚Äôs your favorite demon of the airwaves, Nok the Corrupter, coming to you live from the **Prismatic Pavilion**! We are kicking off the **Winners Bracket** of the Tuesday Night Trollball playoffs, and the atmosphere here is absolutely electric‚Äîliterally, I think one of Kython‚Äôs troupe members just shocked a spectator for a copper piece! It‚Äôs Game 1 of a Best of 3 series, and the stakes couldn't be higher! The winner moves one step closer to glory, while the loser gets kicked down to the losers' bracket like a faulty soul in the Demon Prison! 

Tonight, we‚Äôve got the **Confluence Captains** sailing in from the World's Spine Mountains to take on the hometown favorites, **The Starlight Bazaar Bizarres**! Now, the Captains are backed by the Guild of the Black Sky, which means plenty of gold and probably a few 'accidental' audits for their enemies. I saw **Ladew Evelina** in the tunnels earlier chugging a raw egg, shell and all! Now that‚Äôs what I call a balanced breakfast for a woman who loves her Axe! And keep an ear out for **O'Conner Maighdlin**‚Äîhe‚Äôs been speaking only in rhymes for the last hour. I hope 'goal' rhymes with 'shattering their soul,' because that‚Äôs what we want to see today!

On the other side of the field, the Bizarres are looking to defend their turf over the Starlight Lagoon. It‚Äôs a bit flashy for my tastes‚Äîtoo many colors, not enough obsidian‚Äîbut you have to admire their dedication to the craft. I caught **Gagliano Tallbott** whispering a terrible joke to the Trollball. If the ball starts laughing, we might have a possession problem! They‚Äôre lead by the flamboyant Kython, and while I usually prefer my circus acts with more chains and eternal torment, these Bizarres know how to put on a bloody show! 

With the crowd buzzing and the **Lagoon Splash** threatening to soak anyone who gets too close to the edge, this is going to be a dandy! The Captains have a bit more support in the stands today, but will the Guild‚Äôs gold be enough to overcome the **Unstable Footing** of this floating pavilion? Let's get ready for some sanctioned mayhem! ü¶¥üí•üèüÔ∏è
postGame:
### üèÜ A TOTAL SHUTOUT! CAPTAINS CRUSH THE CARNIVAL! üèÜ

Well, pull my horns and call me a goat, what a one-sided slaughter we just witnessed! The **Confluence Captains** didn't just win; they dismantled the **Starlight Bazaar Bizarres** with a final score of **4 to 0**! It was a masterclass in mountain-sized brutality that left the Prismatic Troupe looking more like a pile of discarded costumes than a Trollball team! üõëüèà

The action started faster than a soul escaping the pits! **Vonni Geoff** snatched up the head, and before the Bizarres could even strike a theatrical pose, **O'Conner Maighdlin** launched a shot from Center Field that zipped right into the basket! **1-0** early on, and you could hear the rhyming cheers from the mountain-folk all the way in the back rows! 

But folks, the violence is why we‚Äôre all here, isn't it? **Caves Cestar** absolutely leveled **Pompei Hephzipa**, sending him to the healer with a sound like a dry branch snapping! The Bizarres tried to fight back‚Äî**Quintessa Austine** put a real hurt on **Behl Berstine**, and **Demp Chet** did the same to **Stephan Lisk**. For a while there, it looked like the field was going to be more bodies than Glowstone! Even **Willa Lois** got in on the action, knocking **Vonni Geoff** out of commission. 

Just when the Bizarres thought they had a chance to breathe, **O'Conner Maighdlin**‚Äîthe Rhyming Rogue himself‚Äîdanced through the defense and performed a spectacular dunk right into the End Zone! **2-0** going into the half! I haven't seen that much grace since Morgwae tried to explain portal physics to a commoner! 

Halftime gave everyone a chance to reset their broken bones, but the Captains didn't lose an ounce of momentum. **Ladew Evelina**, fueled by that raw egg no doubt, came out swinging and sent **Willa Lois** straight to the sidelines! It was beautiful, folks, simply poetic! 

Then came the nail in the coffin. **Richia Pazit** found a gap in the bazaar's chaotic defense, charged into the End Zone, and slammed the ball home for another dunk! **4-0**! The Bizarres looked like they were standing on marbles, and that **Unstable Footing** of the pavilion certainly didn't help their cause. 

Toward the end, the Bizarres got desperate. **Pompei Hephzipa** managed to injure **Ladew Evelina**, and **Quintessa Austine** took out **Caves Cestar**, but it was far too little, far too late. The Captains' defense, led by **Belding Chloe** and her armpit-rubbed ball, held firm like the very mountains they call home. 

I have to say, it‚Äôs a bit embarrassing for Kython and his 'Fatebreakers.' They couldn't break a wet paper bag today! Maybe they should spend less time on theatrical poses and more time learning how to block a Pollaxe. The Guild of the Black Sky must be laughing all the way to the bank, while Brennen Farno probably just looked in a mirror and sighed at his own perfection. 

So, the **Confluence Captains** take a 1-0 lead in this Best of 3 series! They are looking like a freight train with no brakes, heading straight for the finals! The Bizarres better find some better jokes to tell that Trollball, because right now, they're the only ones being laughed at! 

What a day for Trollball! What a day for carnage! I‚Äôm Nok the Corrupter, and I‚Äôll see you for Game 2, where we‚Äôll see if the Bizarres can find their footing or if they‚Äôll be swept away into the lagoon of losers! Stay brutal, Osterra! üíÄüéâüî•
